In today's audio, we talk about crude oil imports, digital rupee, and Ashwini Vaishnaw's comments on deepfakes. Also know which stocks to focus on.

articles.title: Taj hotel data breach: What the company has to say, ransom demanded, conditions set by hackers - Times of India
articles.description: Indian Hotels Company Ltd (IHCL) is investigating claims of a data breach after personal details of about 1.5 million people may have been compromised

articles.title: Bill Gates' ‘3 Days Work Week’ vs Narayana Murthy ‘70 hours’: Former Microsoft Boss Re-Ignites The Debate - Times Now
articles.description: Former Microsoft CEO Bill Gates while talking to Trevor Noah on his podcast 'What Now' admitted that with artificial intelligence taking over, humans will not have to work so hard. The 68-year-old added that three-day work week could be possible, a view that …

articles.title: Trade Spotlight | How you should deal in HPCL, Suzlon Energy, Hero MotoCorp today? - Moneycontrol
articles.description: With the recent upward journey, Hero MotoCorp went closer to its high of February 2021 (Rs 3,629). The stock formed strong bullish candlestick pattern with minute upper shadow on the daily scale with healthy volumes.
